class.name: RoomGenerator
class.brief_description: Base class for implementing room generation algorithms.
class.description: RoomGenerator is an abstract base class that defines the interface for generating room positions in a procedurally generated dungeon. Derived classes should implement specific algorithms for distributing rooms across the dungeon space.

method.name: generate_rooms
method.description: Generates room positions within the given dimensions. This is a virtual method that should be overridden in derived classes to implement specific room generation algorithms (e.g., Poisson disk sampling, grid-based, random).
